actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 94-15.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against House Joint Resolution 210.  Joint resolution making further urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

summary.text: Provides that upon the adoption of this resolution it shall be in order to move, clause 2(1)(6) of rule XI and clause 7 of rule XXI to the contrary notwithstanding, that the House resolve itself into the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 210) making further urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, and for other purposes, and all points of order against said joint resolution for failure to comply with the provisions of clause 2, rule XXI, are hereby waived.

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against House Joint Resolution 210.  Joint resolution making further urgent supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
